import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={currentBlock:0,initialBlock:0};export const blockSlice=createSlice({name:'Block',initialState,reducers:{setBlock:(state,action)=>{if(state.initialBlock===0){state.initialBlock=action.payload;}state.currentBlock=action.payload;}}});// Actions
export const{setBlock}=blockSlice.actions;export default blockSlice.reducer;
